artist: artist: Attributed to Battista Franco; artist: Formerly attributed to Girolamo da Carpi
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: standing draped female figure; one bared breast; hands are hidden; draping is belted with two twined ropes
inscription: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at lower right: n.o 119
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash on paper
title: Study of an Antique Draped Statue ('Venus Genetrix', with Roman Belt)
